Class Task

java.lang.Object
se.kth.saeedvan.taskmanager.model.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Task>
public class Task extends Object implements Comparable<Task>, Serializable
This class represents logic and data for a task.

Does not handle storing and printing of elements.

Author:
Saeed Kassab, Van Matti
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      protected Task(String description, TaskPrio prio, int id)

  • Method Details

    • setTakenBy

      public void setTakenBy(String takenBy) throws IllegalStateException
      Sets which user has taken the task by the given parameter takenBy. If the task is already taken, the variable remains unchanged and an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      takenBy - the username of the user who wants to take the task
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the task is already taken

    • setState

      public void setState(TaskState state)
      Updates the current state. Updates the lastUpdate timestamp to the current date.
      Parameters:
      state - the new state to set

    • setPrio

      public void setPrio(TaskPrio prio)
      Updates the current priority. Updates the lastUpdate timestamp to the current date.
      Parameters:
      prio - the new priority to set

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Task other)
      Compares which task has the higher, lower or equal priority. In case of equal priority description is compared.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Task>
      Parameters:
      other - the task to be compared
      Returns:
      a negative number if this task's priority is less than the other tasks priority, a positive number if this task's priority is greater than the other tasks priority, zero if they have the same priority and then compares the description.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares if this task and the other task has the same priority and description.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare with
      Returns:
      true if the given object is equal to this task, false otherwise.
